about_the_game:
Senile Zombies is a magic-themed zombie survival shooter that can be played alone or in co-operative multiplayer. Shoot your way through multiple rounds of increasingly strong enemies, while upgrading your own powers to keep up.

Senile Zombies offers many customization settings to tailor the game's difficulty and feeling to your taste and offer replayability and ever increasing challenges.

Story

When wizards become increasingly starved of mana, they completely lose their minds. Such "Senile Zombies" roam the world and gather wherever mana crystals are to be found. These "Senile Zombies" also hungrily attack any aspiring Wizard brimming with mana.

On your search for mana, power, and knowledge, you have stumbled into ruins swarming with Senile Zombies. Fight them off or be devoured!

Features

  • Singleplayer Mode
  • Multiplayer Mode
  • 1 Map with five rooms. Rooms are unlocked as the game continues
  • 2 enemy types, increasing in strength with every round
  • 1 boss type enemy
  • 3 upgrade stations (Health, Mana, Spell)
  • 1 spell ability
  • Sprint mechanic
  • Revive mechanic to restore downed allies
  • Lobby with extensive game settings customization
  • In-game scoreboard

Upcoming

  • Powerups
  • More enemy types
  • More spells
  • More maps

  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Core i3-3225 (3.3 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-7300U (3.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or higher
